lookup.name: Lookup
lookup.description: Look up a domain per request
text: Perform instant technology lookups with the Lookup API. Results are fetched from our comprehensive database of millions of websites. If we haven't seen a domain before, we'll index it immediately and report back within minutes.
Results are site-wide and may even include pages behind logins that typical crawlers can't reach. Where available, country, language and traffic data are included.

analyze.name: Analyze
analyze.description: Analyze a single web page per request
analyze.text: Identify the technologies used on any public URL in real-time. Results are always guaranteed up-to-date and delivered within seconds.

crawl.name: Crawl
crawl.text: Identify the technologies used on any public website in real-time. Results are always guaranteed up-to-date and delivered within minutes.
